title: Ride On Sweeper DRS-250T
description: The DRS-250T Ride-On Sweeper is an advanced eco-friendly industrial municipal and commercial sweeping ride-on machine. The DRS-250T is capable of sweeping construction sites, roads, airports, warehouses and commercial complexes, all with professional-level accuracy. It is built for maximum operator comfort alongside durability and high-performance components. This machine is ideal for sweeping large areas.
keyFeatures: Extended Runtime - Up to 4 continuous hours of operation for demanding environments.
Superior Coverage - Four side brushes provide precision and a wide sweeping path, enabling effortless handling of vast areas.
High-Capacity Hopper - Operational efficiency is increased with the 250L waste tank that minimizes the frequency of unloading.
Industrial-Grade Build - Enhanced durability for use in factories, warehouses and outdoor use.
Operator Comfort - Intuitive controls smooth maneuverability, ergonomic seating make ease of work out of long hours.
